product_name: Karbon Bacchus Insulated Jacket - Men's - 2014 Overstock
long_description: Feel like a ski racer in the Bacchus jacket with its European styling and technology. You'll feel warm and dry as well, thanks to stretch waterproof, breathable fabric and soft synthetic insulation.
short_description: Feel like a ski racer in the Bacchus jacket with its European styling and technology. You'll feel warm and dry as well, thanks to stretch waterproof, breathable fabric and soft synthetic insulation.
